page.title: 14Judo in Markyate
page.content: {JUDO CLUB In Markyate there is a Judo Club that meets in the Community Hall on Pickford Hill every Tuesday night at 8.15 till 9.15.Firstly we put the mat up.It's like a small square mat,then we put rectangular mats round it in a spiral. Then we lay a thick canvas over the top.Firstly we do warming up exercises then we practice a particular throw or a hold and the teacher corrects us. Sometimes we play games.We have a competition between ourselves each week. You have to be over the age of 5 to join.It costs 65p a week and Â£5 a year membership. There is grading every 6 months and big competitions quite often.To take part you need a Judo suit or you can use a tracksuit and bare feet.
